spell.name: Sanguine Blast
spell.description: A bolt of blood streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they take 1d10 necrotic damage and Rauds restores half of the damage dealt as hitpoints. On a successful save, Rauds does not restore any hitpoints and the target takes half damage.
